summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), light levels (up 3797 lux), and cloud levels (up 505 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1437 m), rainfall (down 0.2 mm), and light levels (up 6121 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 505.1m lower than yesterday, 1020.7m lower than past week, 1437.0m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1368.2m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable. Possible light showers, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and a mix of sun and clouds. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
